title: Processes - Diff Eq Separation of Variables

content.question: What is the general solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the fraction with numerator the cosine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, and denominator the cosine of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, minus, the sine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, equals C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, minus, 2 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, equals C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, minus, the sine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, equals C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the tangent of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, minus, the sine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, equals C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 times the sine of, open parenthesis, 4 y, close parenthesis, minus, the sine of, open parenthesis, 8 x, close parenthesis, equals C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>8</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.6: Finding General Solutions Using Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
